subject: Grass
Tennis
Olympic Games (2012)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
organizations: All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club
lead_paragraph: An annual, complex botanical battle to ready Wimbledon for its annual fortnight of Grand Slam tennis will this year be extended for the London Games.
snippet: An annual, complex botanical battle to ready Wimbledon for its annual fortnight of Grand Slam tennis will this year be extended for the London Games.
